attributes.action: Block vaccine mandates for frontline healthcare workers.
attributes.additional_details:
As we have seen in the care homes and the care sector at large this is likely to lead to massive staff shortages due to resignations at a time when the NHS is struggling due to demand and understaffing as it is. Ambulance and A&E services are crumbling and this will worsen the situation.

This is also a breach of the European court of Human rights article 8 right to private life and article 9 right to freedom of thought, conscience and religion. 

Britain isn't a nation of petty tyrants.
attributes.background:
Overturn or block any vaccination mandate for COVID 19 in any front line workers or emergency service. 

Recognise the illegality if requiring such experimental medical procedures that the patient's recieving them are not allowed compensation from the manufacturer if they suffer complications.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Do not require health and social care workers to take covid-19 vaccination
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577842
